text: David Bailie (4 December 1937 - 5 March 2021) was a South African-born British movie, television, stage, voice actor, and photographer who was known for his role as Cotton in Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl, Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest, and in Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End. Bailie was born in 1937 in Springs, Gauteng, South Africa. He married Egidija Bailie in 2002. Bailie died on 5 March 2021, aged 83.L’acteur David Bailie est mort à l’âge de 83 ans ==References== ==Other websites== * * Bailie's website Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:British movie actors Category:British television actors Category:British stage actors Category:British voice actors Category:British photographers Category:South African actors Category:People from Stockport Category:Actors from Greater Manchester
title: David Bailie
